sentence.Network_en: The processing mineralogy character for altered granite pattern tantalite - columbite ore and its processibility has been studied.
sentence.Network_cn: 作者详细研究了蚀变花岗岩型钽铌矿—我国南方某钽铌矿的工艺矿物学特性,并对其可选性进行了分析.

sentence.Network_en: There is high tantalite grade for certain large scale granite - pegmatite pattern tantalite - columbite mine in our country.
sentence.Network_cn: 我国某大型花岗伟晶岩型铌钽矿含钽品位高居我国钽铌矿山之首.

sentence.Network_en: Eluvial tantalite: Eluvial tantalite is found in rubble consisting of fragments and pebbles of varied composition.
sentence.Network_cn: 残积层钽铁矿: 残积层钽铁矿发现于由碎片和小鹅卵石成分的碎矿中.

means.word_mean: 1. a mineral consisting of tantalum oxide of iron and manganese that occurs with niobite or in coarse granite; an ore of tantalum
